Articles.Content: I saw the doodle for father's day today on the home page. I wondered what were your favourite Google doodles. Mine so far were the Magna Carta one and the Sally Ride doodle.

The best one I can remember is the Sally Ride thing they did a little while back.

Wouldn't it be cool if they did a KSP doodle? ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
The ones during the Olympics a few years back were pretty cool.

The Pacman one!

It came with full gaming functionality!

> 
> The Pacman one!
> It came with full gaming functionality!

Ah yes, that one! That was good!
